extendedInfo.description: Glovebox brings to android the best way of multi tasking.Swipe without lifting the finger to select an application to open.Features:- Apps/Shortcuts/Widgets on side bar.- Reorder apps.- Personalize side bar & icons.- Recent apps menu.- Long press edge menu (quickly toggle bar side or open configuration).- Blacklist (choose what apps glovebox will pause).- Add Folders.XDA Developers Thread:http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=37600464#post37600464FAQ:-How to enable Glovebox on MIUIv5?Go to the app info and enable 'Show popup window notification' setting. Then restart the app.-Got the old premium version (Ubuntu Phone Experience) ?Send an email so you don't have to purchase it again.-I bought the premium version, now is asking to purchase it again (using the same account)Try to clear the cache and data of Play Store, then start Play Store at least once.Android Settings>Apps>Play Store app>Clear Cache/Data.If this didn't work contact by email.-Why does the app need DIRECTLY CALL PHONE NUMBERS permission?This permission is only necessary for Direct Dial shortcuts that might be added to the apps list.-How do i open recent apps menu?Swipe to the outside of the bar, without lifting the finger off the screen and selecting recent apps. Wait a sec to open recent apps menu. To close, swipe the finger back to the bar.-Am i unable to install other apps while the app is running?For security reasons android automatically blocks the installation of other apps while Glovebox is running,  to prevent installations without your consent. You have to disable the app and re-enable it again after the installation.Reviews:http://www.droid-life.com/2013/02/21/glovebox-for-android-a-beautiful-app-switcher-taking-design-love-from-ubuntu/http://www.cultofandroid.com/23451/bring-ubuntus-gestures-to-any-android-device-how-to/Other InfoIcons used on main screenshot?http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1701281Keywords & Tags:multitasking, side launcher, sidebar, ubuntu, unity, apps, touch os, task, switch, widgets

reviews.title: Trigger area could use better configuration
reviews.comment: I want the trigger area to be the bottom quarter of my screen. Right now this isn\'t possible. Fix this and it\'ll be five stars!  Update: After months it\'s still not possible to put the top of the trigger area lower than half way down my screen. Why?
reviews.author: Siavash Golkar

reviews.title: Bugs introduced
reviews.comment: Choppy when changing between the icons, also swiping to the end now needs 2 seconds to open, cant it be configurable instead of 2 sec which is too long.
reviews.author: Omar Rafie

reviews.title: Better but not as good
reviews.comment: The sensitivity of the sliding bar seems to be fixed now (as of 9/9/13), but the scrolling becomes very choppy for some reason... Well.... Not very impressed with the latest update I guess.... But good additional functionality, thanks still.
reviews.author: Ian Weng

reviews.title: Good quick launcher
reviews.comment: Could be better though like more transparent themes.
reviews.author: Jonathan Lee

reviews.comment: was amazing untill last update, it was so smooth but now its a pain, i dont want to revert because the themes are better\tbasically have an option for smoother controls

reviews.title: Handy access to apps
reviews.comment: I am using this app for around 6 months... neat interface very useful to access frequently used apps..

reviews.title: Thanks for fixing the bugs
reviews.comment: Would love the ability to add multiple bars ala some of your more recent competitors. I have the paid version but some f the other apps are looking better now.

reviews.title: I like the old one
reviews.comment: The new update is getting slower than before, plz fix it

reviews.title: Recent update (sept 9)
reviews.comment: Usable now, however very jumpy and not as smooth as it used to be. Nexus 4

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Best app ever not made by Google!

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: It works again after the last actualization. Bit it does not work the long press men\303\272, and i don\'t like the transition effect

reviews.title: One of My Favorites
reviews.comment: This is by far my most favorite and most used app to date. I love it when it works properly and tell my friends.

reviews.title: Choopy animation
reviews.comment: I was impressed by the dev before, but i am so disappointed now, because of the choppy animation while changing between the icon....

reviews.title: Quickest sidebar app
reviews.comment: Quickest sidebar app available. Super easy to setup and use. So good that it should be apart of stock android.  I wish the shortcut actions would update automatically if the user photo has changed.

reviews.title: Long press menu
reviews.comment: The long press menu function somehow didn\'t work, please fix

reviews.comment: One of the must have apps!.. Only problem I faced is that when I click on the recent apps icon, it has a slight delay in opening.. Fix that nd il give 5 stars..
